definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Can you use lipstick on your eyes?
sentences.chinese: 把脣線筆當作眼線筆使用或者反一反？

sentences.english: Hold applicator at a slight angle and apply color to the base of the lashes.
sentences.chinese: 以稍微傾斜的角度拿着眼線筆，從睫毛的根部上色。

sentences.english: Also, make full use of the quality of a good eyeliner, waterproof effect will be better.
sentences.chinese: 還有，儘量使用品質好的眼線筆，防水效果會更好些。

sentences.english: There are different types of kohl.
For thicker application, apply at a flat angle.
sentences.chinese: 將眼線筆平角勾畫便可描繪出一條較粗的眼線。

sentences.english: He gropes again in his pocket and finds his girlfriend’s eyeliner.
sentences.chinese: 他在此摸索他的口袋並且發現了他女朋友的眼線筆。

sentences.english: Use a water-resistant eyeliner that can withstand tears.
sentences.chinese: 使用可以抵住淚水的防水眼線筆。
沒有比液體眼線筆更好的選擇了。

sentences.english: French eye-liners are well-known to the world.
As an eyeliner this has staying power, yet comes off easily.
sentences.chinese: 作爲眼線筆用，色彩保持精彩，而卸妝非常容易。

sentences.english: He gropes again in his pocket and finds his girlfriend's eyeliner.
sentences.chinese: 他在此摸索他的口袋並且發現了他女朋友的眼線筆。

sentences.english: Includes eyebrow shadows, eyeliners, and highlighters.
sentences.chinese: 包括眉陰影，眼線筆，和熒光筆。

definition: chicken ribs/sth of little value or interest/sth of dubious worth that one is reluctant to give up/to be physically weak
